snippet: Our shared surname seemed a valid reason to overthrow any and all objections, including our 13-year age difference.
abstract: Milla Goldenberg Modern Love column describes how she was willing to overthrow any and all objections, including a 13-year age difference, for a man she had never met who shared the same surname as her.
lead_paragraph: Our shared surname seemed a valid reason to overthrow any and all objections, including our 13-year age difference.

headline.seo: So Much in Common, in Name Only — Modern Love
headline.main: So Much in Common, in Name Only
headline.print_headline: So Much in Common, in Name Only
